snippet: The National Football League must be unflinching in its investigation into accusations of bullying and abuse in the Miami Dolphins’ locker room.
abstract: Editorial calls for the National Football League to be unflinching in its investigation of accusations of locker room hazing by Miami Dolphins lineman Richie Incognito against fellow player Jonathan Martin; maintains bullying and abuse off the field must be brought under control.
lead_paragraph: The National Football League must be unflinching in its investigation into accusations of bullying and abuse in the Miami Dolphins’ locker room.
